Package org.mcm.sws

The WSplan Semantic Web Service toolset.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
URIIdentifiable  
 

Class Summary
ExecEnvironment The ExecEnvironment contains the agent's FACT BASE.
Registry Central data container of the system.
ServiceExec2 This class handles the low level operations involved in calling web services.
WSPlan This class privodes the point of entry for both GUI and NON-GUI based mode.
 

Exception Summary
PlanningException Exception thrown by implementations of planning strategies,etc.
 

Package org.mcm.sws Description

The WSplan Semantic Web Service toolset. It offers classes for the interactive planning of Web service processes, it offers classes for executing pre-defined Web services and other tools. The system operates upon WSDL documents and SESMA based annotations and process descriptions. See the white paper for furher information (paper in progress)
